title: Typeface of the British Museum
content:
Hi Guys,

Any ideas what the typeface of the British Museum's logo is?

Cheers :-)
author: Lasse Kristensen

comments.content: I haven't been there lately -- do you have a sample?

I think it's ITC Highlander Book.

Nick Cooke
